item.title: Littler cruises into round four but Bunting beaten
item.description: Luke Littler is into the last 16 but fourth seed Stephen Bunting becomes the highest-ranked player to exit this year's PDC World Championship.

item.title: War-torn Myanmar votes in widely criticised 'sham' election
item.description: Observers say the vote, accompanied by a renewed crackdown on dissent, is meant to entrench the junta's power.

item.title: Villa will not speak about league target until game 34 - Emery
item.description: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery insists it is still too early to say whether his side is in contention for the Premier League title despite being third in the table after their 2-1 victory against Chelsea.
